title: Banned permanently first time
body:
Hello , i've been banned permanently before 3 hours ago for first time..it's my first time when happens to me that situation... ... without any reason can you help me guys with that 
i didn't receive nothing on e-mail .. or something like that 
I did not done something bad in game , maybe sometimes flamming...but i never done ''Feed'' 
If Someone can help please don't hesitate to contact me
Thank's a lot
{{champion:131}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:163}} 
I really miss my champions {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It looks like there's something kind of odd going on in the backend, but this isn't a punishment perse. Please be sure to hit up our agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get all of the context of what's going on and work towards getting this figured out. I wouldn't want to go over too much of your personal info here on the boards is all fam!

It sometimes takes a little while before you get your notice, but if you really want to know, you can submit a support ticket. Many people get punished for their chat behavior, it's not uncommon. Some extremely negative words or sayings could speed up that punishment.
Thank's a lot but please can you tell how i can get this ''support ticket'' ..

I'm not sure whether or not this link is for NA specifically, or for all. But you should also see a "[Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)" link on the left hand side.
